title: The declaration of the Lord de la Noue, vpon his taking armes for the iust defence of the townes of Sedan and Iametz, frontiers of the realme of Fraunce, and vnder the protection of his Maiestie. Truely translated (according to the French copie printed at Verdun) by A.M.
author: La Noue, François de, 1531-1591.
notes: A translation of: Déclaration de Monsieur de la Noue, sur sa prise des armes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
